Name: Archie
Description: Archie used to spend his days on a leash wanting to be free so I asked his owners if I could have him and fortunately, they said yes. He was spayed, has all the vaccines and blood works done and soon will be with his new Canadian family.

Name: Coffee
Description: Coffee was abandoned when he was a puppy of only 6 months. He was rescued and he is now spayed, vaccinated and ready to be adopted.
